response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering carries with it a wealth of features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $1,500,000.

I understand that the true value of this product may be subjective and varies based on your specific needs and circumstances. Therefore, I would like to extend to you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This offer is valid for a limited time only and includes comprehensive support and a satisfaction guarantee.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to provide further details to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
